## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                  | Type                             | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | Animation type - shimmer: Gradient animation (default) - pulse: Opacity pulse animation - none: No animation                                                                 | `"none" \| "pulse" \| "shimmer"` | `'shimmer'` |
| `height`    | `height`    | The height of the skeleton                                                                                                                                                   | `string`                         | `'1rem'`    |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | The shape variant of the skeleton - text: Slightly rounded, good for text placeholders - rect: More rounded, good for cards/images - circle: Fully rounded, good for avatars | `"circle" \| "rect" \| "text"`   | `'text'`    |
| `width`     | `width`     | The width of the skeleton                                                                                                                                                    | `string`                         | `'100%'`    |
